DOC.brief_summary: This study seeks to assess the durability of response and persistence of resistance to ombitasvir/ paritaprevir/ritonavir in Japanese participants who enrolled in a Phase 2 or 3 clinical study with these agents for the treatment of chronic hepatitis C.
DOC.brief_title: The Durability of Response and Persistence of Resistance to AbbVie's 2 Direct-acting Antiviral Agent (2D) Therapy in Japanese Subjects
DOC.criteria: Participants treated in Study M12536 or M13004 with the 2D regimen (ombitasvir/ paritaprevir/ ritonavir) and completed 48 weeks of followup, regardless of SVR achievement. Participants who agree to sign the informed consent Participants treated with a directacting antiviral agent (DAA) immediately after Study M12536 or M13004.
